quest_desc.qdesc: 칼라엔이 이번에는 그 놀 일당이 고엽의 숲 폭발 구역에 나타났다고 한다. 예의 그 이상한 2인조를 발견할 수 있는데 위습들 사이에서 곤란에 처한 듯하다. 위습들을 물리치고 말을 걸면, 코볼트 기사 돈호키테는 여전히 자신이 여신의 계시를 받아서 위습들과 대화를 시도중이었다고 한다. 어딘가에 사로잡힌 정령들의 여왕을 구하기 위해서는 애쉬 위습들에게서 정령들의 여왕이 갇힌 곳을 알아야 한다는 것이다. 하지만 그곳의 정령들은 이미 저주에 걸려서 더 이상 대화를 할 수 없는 상태가 된 듯하다고 횡설수설한다.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Oh~ Is there anything fun to do?
(You have to complete the previous quest)

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
I will save the Queen of the spirits!
(You have to get the quest from Court Sorceress Kayleen)

$self-Acclaimed Squire Chanso$
Don Xiqote!
Leave everything to me!
I'll go wherever you're going, knight!
(You have to get the quest from Court Sorceress Kayleen)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh really? But I'm happy that everything seems ok.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Hey, what a good timing.
You know, the mad Don Xiqote that you saw last time.
He seems to have appeared at Withered Leaves Forest Explosion Zone this time.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't tell me you want me to go there.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Usually fools and madmen don't die easily. That's always the problem.
But I'm curious what that crazy man is doing.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen${action:Talk}
Oh, you know well. I was just feeling bored.
Hoho, go to Withered Leaves Forest Explosion Zone and find out what that knight or something Don Xiqote is doing.
<html>$Knight's Mission$</html>

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Withered Leaves Forest Explosion Zone is not far from here so you'll be quick, am I right?
Hoho, I'll be waiting for interesting news.

$self-Acclaimed Squire Chanso$
Why aren't the spirits telling us where their Queen is?!
(You have to talk to self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote)

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
Oh no, you have killed all the spirits who know where their queen is! It has become even harder to look for the Queen of the Spirits now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But didn't those ash wisps try to harm you?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
That's right. The ones that you have killed just now were all closely related to the Queen. Only they know where the queen is. How can such an unfortunate thing happen.

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
I can't understand why they were so hostile towards me.
It must be because they know that my faith is not strong enough and they were trying to test me... or... Oh yes!

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
I must be in curse!
The evil king's cruel curse must have blurred their senses!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Don Xiqote's face is full of grief)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
It's a pity. Spirits who are originally wise and kind have fallen into such curse!

$self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote$
There must be some spirits who have managed to escape this terrible curse by the evil king. First, I should search Ruins of Lost Time.
(It seems useless to talk to him anymore)

$self-Acclaimed Squire Chanso$
Don Xiqote!
Until you find the Queen of the Spirits! I, Chanso, will follow you!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He said he was looking for the Queen of the Spirits.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Are you back?
What was that crazy knight doing?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He looked like he thought the ash wisps knew where the Queen of Spirits was.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Haha. Why are they looking for the queen there?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But that knight, Don Xiqote, seemed serious.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen${action:Talk}
Ash wisps?
Haha, this is the funniest joke that I heard of recently.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That monster may be crazy, but he seemed sincere in wanting to save the spirits.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Were you infected by them and lost your mind too?
Think about it. It has been centuries since the spirits have disappeared.
It's funny to look for spirits now.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Being sincere and naïve are different things, kid.
That knight or something is not sincere but naïve.
If he has had a taste of the bitter things in life, he wouldn't be like that anymore.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Well, we can bet too.
I bet that he'll cry saying that he wants to go home someday.
Just watch.

journal.title: Talk to self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote
journal.contents:
At Withered Leaves Forest Explosion Zone look for self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote.

Foothills of Black Mountain(Lonely Forest Path) → Withered Leaves Forest Explosion Zone
journal.destination: Talk to self-Acclaimed Knight Don Xiqote

journal.title: Talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen
journal.contents:
Go to Saint Haven's Court Sorceress Kayleen and tell her about Don Xiqote.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Court Sorceress Kayleen
